required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Dronabinol to Treat Obstructive Sleep Apnea
clinical_study.official_title: Cannabimimetic Treatment of Obstructive Sleep Apnea: A Proof of Concept Trial

brief_summary.textblock: This is a proof of concept study to determine the safety and efficacy of dronabinol for the treatment of obstructive sleep apnea syndrome (OSA).

primary_outcome.description: Change in AHI derived as: AHI (end of treatment) minus AHI (pre-treatment)

Change in ESS derived as: ESS (end of treatment) minus ESS (pre-treatment). The ESS scale has a range of 0 to 24, with 0 representing the least degree of sleepiness and 24 the greatest degree of sleepiness. There are no subscales.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Sleep Latency: Maintenance of Wakefulness Test (MWT)
primary_outcome.description: Change in MWT derived as: MWT (end of treatment) minus MWT (pre-treatment). The Maintenance of Wakefulness Test measures a person's ability to stay awake in a quiet, dark and nonstimulating room for a period of time.

secondary_outcome.measure: Tolerability by Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medications (TSQM) Overall Score.
secondary_outcome.description: The TSQM measures a person's satisfaction with treatment based on a 7-point scale ranging from "Extremely Dissatisfied" to "Extremely Satisfied" in response to the question, "Taking all things into account, how satisfied or dissatisfied are you with this medication?".
AEs will be evaluated and tracked throughout subject participation (up to 8 weeks)
Change in DT (total minutes with arterial oxygen saturation below 85% during 8-hour polysomnography) derived as: DT (end of treatment) minus DT (pre-treatment)

arm_group.description: Placebo, once per day (QD) by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 6 weeks after 1-week run-in
Dronabinol, 2.5 mg QD by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 6 weeks after 1-week placebo run-in
Dronabinol, 10 mg QD by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 4 weeks after 1-week placebo run-in and 2-week dose escalation

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Participants were recruited from physician referrals at two academic medical centers as well as from the community based upon print and radio advertising between January 2013 and May 2016. The first participant was enrolled in February 2013 and the last participant was enrolled in April 2016.

group.title: Sugar Pill
group.description: Placebo, once per day (QD) by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 6 weeks after 1-week run-in Placebo (for Dronabinol)

group.title: 2.5 mg/Day
group.description: Dronabinol, 2.5 mg QD by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 6 weeks after 1-week placebo run-in Dronabinol

group.title: 10 mg/Day
group.description: Dronabinol, 10 mg QD by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 4 weeks after 1-week placebo run-in and 2-week dose escalation Dronabinol

baseline.population: Baseline analysis population includes all participants who were randomized to treatment.

group.title: Sugar Pill
group.description: Placebo, once per day (QD) by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 6 weeks after 1-week run-in Placebo (for Dronabinol)

group.title: 2.5 mg/Day
group.description: Dronabinol, 2.5 mg QD by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 6 weeks after 1-week placebo run-in Dronabinol

group.title: 10 mg/Day
group.description: Dronabinol, 10 mg QD by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 4 weeks after 1-week placebo run-in and 2-week dose escalation Dronabinol

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

category.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

measure.title: Sleep Efficiency
measure.description: Sleep Efficiency is calculated as the total time spent asleep divided by the total amount of time spent in bed, multiplied by 100.

outcome.title: Change in Apnea/Hypopnea Index (AHI)
outcome.description: Change in AHI derived as: AHI (end of treatment) minus AHI (pre-treatment)
outcome.population: Analysis performed including all participants who completed the full 6-weeks of treatment.

group.title: Sugar Pill
group.description: Placebo, once per day (QD) by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 6 weeks after 1-week run-in Placebo (for Dronabinol)

group.title: 2.5 mg/Day
group.description: Dronabinol, 2.5 mg QD by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 6 weeks after 1-week placebo run-in Dronabinol

group.title: 10 mg/Day
group.description: Dronabinol, 10 mg QD by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 4 weeks after 1-week placebo run-in and 2-week dose escalation Dronabinol

measure.title: Change in Apnea/Hypopnea Index (AHI)
measure.description: Change in AHI derived as: AHI (end of treatment) minus AHI (pre-treatment)
measure.population: Analysis performed including all participants who completed the full 6-weeks of treatment.

outcome.title: Change in Epworth Sleepiness Scale (ESS)
outcome.description: Change in ESS derived as: ESS (end of treatment) minus ESS (pre-treatment). The ESS scale has a range of 0 to 24, with 0 representing the least degree of sleepiness and 24 the greatest degree of sleepiness. There are no subscales.
outcome.population: Data are missing for 2 participants randomized to receive Placebo treatment; due to technical error in not completing this instrument.

group.description: Placebo, once per day (QD) by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 6 weeks after 1-week run-in Placebo (for Dronabinol)

group.title: 10 mg/Day
group.description: Dronabinol, 10 mg QD by mouth, 60 minutes before bedtime for 4 weeks after 1-week placebo run-in and 2-week dose escalation Dronabinol

measure.title: Change in Epworth Sleepiness Scale (ESS)
measure.description: Change in ESS derived as: ESS (end of treatment) minus ESS (pre-treatment). The ESS scale has a range of 0 to 24, with 0 representing the least degree of sleepiness and 24 the greatest degree of sleepiness. There are no subscales.
measure.population: Data are missing for 2 participants randomized to receive Placebo treatment; due to technical error in not completing this instrument.

outcome.description: Change in MWT derived as: MWT (end of treatment) minus MWT (pre-treatment). The Maintenance of Wakefulness Test measures a person's ability to stay awake in a quiet, dark and nonstimulating room for a period of time.

outcome.title: Tolerability by Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medications (TSQM) Overall Score.
outcome.description: The TSQM measures a person's satisfaction with treatment based on a 7-point scale ranging from "Extremely Dissatisfied" to "Extremely Satisfied" in response to the question, "Taking all things into account, how satisfied or dissatisfied are you with this medication?".
outcome.population: Data are missing for one participant randomized to receive Placebo treatment due to technical error in not collecting the instrument.

event.description: Struck by vehicle while riding a bicycle

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
